Uses of Package
de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.statistics

Packages that use de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.statistics
de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.statistics   
 

Classes in de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.statistics used by de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.statistics
SingleStatistic
          Is embedded in Statistics and represents the individual statistics for each player or unit.
Statistics
           This class holds game wide statistics about all actions within the game in: Global statistic are hold in Statistics.gameStatistic which is a GameStatistics object or by units Statistics.unitStatistics or by single players Statistics.playersStatistics.
